def calculate_permutations_and_sum(N):

    def factorial(no):
        ans = 1
        while no > 0:
            ans *= no
            no -= 1
        return ans
    cnt = 2
    dig_sum = 0
    n = N
    n1 = N
    map1 = {}
    while N > 9:
        N //= 10
        cnt += 1
    no_dig = cnt
    no_dig1 = cnt
    perm = factorial(cnt)
    sum1 = 0
    x = perm // no_dig
    while no_dig > 0:
        dig = n // 10 ** (no_dig - 1)
        if dig not in map1:
            map1[dig] = 1
        else:
            map1[dig] += 1
        sum1 += dig * x
        n %= 10 ** (no_dig - 1)
        no_dig -= 1
    no = 1
    while no_dig1 > 1:
        no += 10 ** (no_dig1 - 1)
        no_dig1 -= 1
    final_sum = sum1 * no
    for items in map1.values():
        M = factorial(items)
        perm //= M
        final_sum //= M
    return [perm, final_sum]
